info.title: MyRekap API Documentation
info.description: MyRekap API provides endpoints to manage users, products, orders, and other operations. All endpoints require authentication via JWT. There are two roles: `superadmin` with full access and `admin` with limited access. This documentation covers all available routes, request parameters, response formats, and authentication requirements.

x-app-name.name: x-app-name
x-app-name.description: Application name used to match the cookie token (token_{x-app-name}) for authentication.

BearerResetToken.description: JWT for password reset. Obtain this token from the response of POST /auth/otp/verify with type "reset_password" in the field "resetToken". Send it via header: Authorization: Bearer {resetToken}.

VerifyOTPPasswordResetResponse.description: Response for successful password reset verification. The 'resetToken' field in the response should be used as the Bearer token for 'BearerResetToken' authentication.

resetToken.description: JWT used for password reset authentication (BearerResetToken).

value.message: Invalid or missing header: x-app-name. Allowed values are 'myrekap' or 'myflower'.
Invalid header. This endpoint is restricted to requests containing 'x-app-name: myrekap' header
Invalid header. This endpoint is restricted to requests containing 'x-app-name: myflower' header
